Card.Name: Concealed Cave Passage
Card.Description: The cave can be confusing, and Lex gets lost many times before stumbling upon an exit.
Card.Info: Lex moves to a random terrain and loses 4 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain. -4 Points

Card.Name: Qilin Lake
Card.Description: Lex finds a beautiful lake guarded by a lone dragon.
Card.Info: The water shimmers brightly despite the dim lighting...
Card.Mechanics: Trigger dialogue sequence, CHOOSE:-10 Points, +10 Magic /OR/ Nothing

Card.Name: Sage Tree Ghost
Card.Description: A great tree stretches higher and wider than its neighbors. Lex is shocked to hear it call out to him. The spirit of the Sage Tree takes pity on Lex's arcane inexperience.
Card.Info: If Lex has less than 25 Magic, he gains 6. If not, he gains only 3.
Card.Mechanics: 25 Magic > +6 Magic, 25 Magic < +3 Magic

Card.Name: Shrouding Mists
Card.Description: Lex is overtaken by a heavy mist and finds he is missing something after emerging on the other side.
Card.Info: Lex discards one random card and draws two cards.
Card.Mechanics: Discard one card, draw two cards

Card.Name: Winding Tunnels
Card.Description: Lex is properly lost in the cave. On the upside, he finds some valuable gems among the crystalline walls.
Card.Info: Lex cannot leave the cave until the next morning phase, but he gains 3 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot leave terrain until next morning phase. +3 Points

Card.Name: Grandpa Bark
Card.Description: Lex encounters an old talking tree on a hill who asks him for a favor.
Card.Info: Old Grandpa Bark may be the oldest tree in the wood...
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, Plus 6 points

Card.Name: Hidden Path
Card.Description: Poking a long stick around pays off when a small path reveals itself to who knows where.
Card.Info: Lex moves to a random terrain and gains 4 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, +4 Points

Card.Name: Magic Chest
Card.Description: Half-submerged in muck lies an enchanted chest. Retrieving it's contents is no problem for Lex and his wand.
Card.Info: Lex draws up to a full hand (3 cards), gaining 2 Points per card drawn. If Lex has over 30 Magic, he gains 2 Magic per card instead.
Card.Mechanics: Draw until full. 30 Magic> +2 Points for each card drawn. 30 Magic< +2 Magic for each card drawn.

Card.Name: Meatcleaver Moira's Moist Meat Market
Card.Description: Meatcleaver Moira might be the most enthusiastic butcher Lex has ever met. She offers him "The Nocturnal Special". How tempting!
Card.Info: Lex loses 4 Points, but can burn cards during this night phase. Alternatively, Lex draws two cards.
Card.Mechanics: CHOOSE: -4 Points, Enables burning cards during next night phase /OR/ Draw 2 cards

Card.Name: Naughty Knickers
Card.Description: Lex finds, hidden away, something soft and lacy, and promptly faints of embarrassment.
Card.Info: Lex through a day phase, draws a card, and gains 3 Magic.
Card.Mechanics: Skip a day phase, draw a card, +3 Magic

Card.Name: Old Log Cabin
Card.Description: What a curious cabin. Seems to be worth investigating. It's a good thing Lex is magically proficient, otherwise he wouldn't have found these tasty mushrooms growing in the walls!
Card.Info: If Lex has over 15 Magic, he gains 2 more.
Card.Mechanics: 15< +2 Magic

Card.Name: Hedge Witch's Hut
Card.Description: Lex's curiosity gets the better of his caution as he knocks on the gnarled door of the gnarled hut. A grinning hag emerges and ushers him inside, "away from them dangerous swamp beasties. The swamps are no place for an upstart wizard!'"
Card.Info: If Magic is less than 20, Lex draws 2 cards. If Magic is more than 20, Lex gains 5 Magic.
Card.Mechanics: 20> Draw 2 cards, 20< +5 Magic

Card.Name: Ser Ludlow's Introduction to Alchemy
Card.Description: The most streamlined introductory text to date, and a staple part of any alchemist’s education. Lex spends some time brushing up on the basics, and relearning some techniques he was performing incorrectly.
Card.Info: Lex Discards his hand and gains 3 Magic.
Card.Mechanics: Discard hand, +3 Magic

Card.Name: The Wily Merchant Gaspard
Card.Description: Lex is approached by a suspiciously eloquent merchant on his travels.
Card.Info: FILL IN
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence. 50% Chance Draw two cards & +1 Point // 50% -3 Points

Card.Name: Unicorn Hair
Card.Description: A thin, silvery strand of unicorn hair falls from seemingly nowhere and wraps around Lex's wand, guiding his way.
Card.Info: Lex moves to a random terrain and draws to a full hand (3 cards).
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, draw up to full

Card.Name: A Strange Note
Card.Description: A mysterious note floats down to Lex off of a chilling breeze. On it are the words scrawled: "Curiosity killed the cat."
Card.Info: Lex gains five points.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 5 Points

Card.Name: Clear The Path
Card.Description: With a flourish of his wand, trees make way and thistles monsters retreat.
Card.Info: Lex moves to a random terrain and gains 2 Magic.
Card.Mechanics: Random Terrain +2 Magic

Card.Name: Common Magical Plants
Card.Description: These magical plants will be delicious if Lex grows them completely.
Card.Info: Lex gains one Point per day phase until he moves terrain.
Card.Mechanics: Until moved terrain, +1 point per day phase

Card.Name: Esoteric Palmist
Card.Description: Lex meets a palmist willing to give him secrets of the future.
Card.Info: Lex moves to a random terrain and gains 4 Magic.
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, +4 Magic

Card.Name: Everlasting Lantern
Card.Description: Lex finds a lantern that just doesn't seem to want to go out.
Card.Info: Lex can burn cards during this night phase.
Card.Mechanics: Enables burning cards during the next night phase

Card.Name: Swamp Gas
Card.Description: Swamp gas is more flammable than Lex realized! His eyebrows may be gone, but at least he landed on something soft.
Card.Info: Lex moves to a random terrain and gains 4 Magic, but loses 2 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Lose 2 Points, Plus 4 Magic, move to random terrain

Card.Name: Knight's Regimen
Card.Description: The knight who wrote this didn't have a lot to say, but Lex gleans what he can.
Card.Info: Lex draws one card.
Card.Mechanics: Draw a card

Card.Name: Love Letter
Card.Description: Lex has found a note, hidden away in his pack- he wonder who it could be from?
Card.Info: Lex doesn't recognize this note or remember where he got it...
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue: The note is from Sis. She wishes him well, says she misses him, but also has written a poem: "cryptic advice for a card choice", +2 Points

Card.Name: Magic Broomstick
Card.Description: Lex finds a magic flying broomstick that proves to be difficult to control.
Card.Info: Lex cannot lost points until the next morning phase. If Lex's Magic is above 20, he draws a card.
Card.Mechanics: Can't lose points until next morning phase. 20< Draw a card

Card.Name: Massive Metal Key
Card.Description: Lex can only wonder what door this massive key might open.
Card.Info: Lex gains 2 Points. The card "Harding Manor Stables" is added to Lex's deck.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Points. Add "Harding Manor Stables" to Lex deck

Card.Name: Path to the Cave
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Caves!
Card.Info: Lex moves to the Cave, and does not move to a random terrain at the end of the day.
Card.Mechanics: Move to Cave. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Path to the Forest
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Forest!
Card.Info: Lex moves to the Forest, and does not move to a random terrain at the end of the day.
Card.Mechanics: Move to Forest. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Path to the Hills
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Hills!
Card.Info: Lex moves to the Hiils, and does not move to a random terrain at the end of the day.
Card.Mechanics: Move to Hills. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Path to the Swamp
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Swamp!
Card.Info: Lex moves to the Swamp, and does not move to a random terrain at the end of the day.
Card.Mechanics: Move to Swamp. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Polite Kettle
Card.Description: A kettle that informs its owner politely when its water is boiling. A fine addition to any household.
Card.Info: Lex gains 2 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Points

Card.Name: Tattered Tent
Card.Description: Lex has found a tattered, yet surprisingly sturdy, tent. It makes him feel quite safe.
Card.Info: The Wilderness will not play a card at the end of this day phase.
Card.Mechanics: Skip the AI's turn this day phase

Card.Name: Warding Spirits
Card.Description: The apparition Lex summons says it will keep watch. At the very least, it makes him feel better.
Card.Info: Lex gains 2 Points and 2 Magic.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Magic, plus 2 Points

Card.Name: Well-Kept House
Card.Description: This house is much too clean to be abandoned, but nobody's home!
Card.Info: This card cannot be burned. Lex gains 7 Points. The card "Well Kept House Owner's Return" is added to the Wilderness's deck.
Card.Mechanics: Can't be burned. +7 Points. Add "Well Kept House Owner's Return" to AI deck

Card.Name: Harding Manor's Stables
Card.Description: The nobility of the manor are very rude about Lex being a wizard, so he settles for spending the night with their horses - without permission, of course. Since Lex has the Massive Metal Key, he finds gold hidden in a storage room.
Card.Info: Lex gains 6 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 6 Points. Week: Special(Massive Metal Key)

Card.Name: Abandoned House
Card.Description: An old hag claiming to be Lex’s Grandmother tries to eat him, but he escapes. Lex discards his hand and draws three cards. -4 Points
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, Discard hand then draw three cards, -4 Points

Card.Name: Ancient Rusted Sword
Card.Description: Lex finds an old, rusted sword hidden among the rubble of an old temple.
Card.Info: Unless Lex's Magic is over 25, a mysterious card is added to the deck.
Card.Mechanics: Magic 25< +3 Magic, Magic 25> -3 Points and add another Gwyllgi Attack to the deck

Card.Name: Snakebite
Card.Description: Lex is awoken by the faint hiss, too close for comfort.
Card.Info: A random, potentially beneficial effect happens.
Card.Mechanics: 40% Chance -8 Points, 60% +4 Magic

Card.Name: Trouble in Trusian Cave
Card.Description: As Lex is in the Trusian cave searching for crystals, he encounters an avalanche of rocks that block his path.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, -1 Point OR -8 Points and discard two cards

Card.Name: A Mighty Gust
Card.Description: A gust of wind bombards Lex in his travels, scattering his things into the dark. -3 points and Lex’s hand is discarded, giving him only magic.
Card.Info: -3 points and Lex’s hand is discarded, giving him only magic.
Card.Mechanics: -3 points and Lex’s hand is discarded, giving him only magic

Card.Name: Bandit Camp
Card.Description: Lex accidentally stumbles upon a bandit camp in his travels.
Card.Info: A random, potentially beneficial effect happens.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, 20% -4 Points, cannot move terrain next day phase OR 30% +4 Points OR 50% Move to a random terrain

Card.Name: Drekavac
Card.Description: Lex encounters a Drekavac which scares him into paralysis. -12 points.
Card.Info: -12 Points
Card.Mechanics: -12 Points

Card.Name: End of the Path
Card.Description: There's nowhere to go from here! Lex discards a card. If his magic is more than 20, he discards two cards instead.
Card.Info: Lex discards a card. If his magic is more than 20, he discards two cards instead.
Card.Mechanics: 20 Magic> Discard 1 card, 20 Magic< Discard 2 cards

Card.Name: Incredibly Hungry
Card.Description: Lex has run out of water being in the swamp for too long and must find something to eat. -2 points per day phase until Lex has left the swamp.
Card.Mechanics: -2 Points for each following consecutive day phase spent in a swamp

Card.Name: Incredibly Thirsty
Card.Description: Lex has run out of water being in the hills for too long and must find something to drink. -2 points per day phase until Lex has left the hills.
Card.Mechanics: -2 Points for each following consecutive day phase spent in a Hills

Card.Name: Midday Storm
Card.Description: The sun is swallowed up by a bunch of angry clouds. Lex is unable to move terrain and loses one of his belongings in the storm.
Card.Info: Lex is unable to move terrain for the next day phase and discards 1 card.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain next day phase, Discard 1 card

Card.Name: A Fork in the Road
Card.Description: Irony dictates that the first choice is the wrong one. Lex moves to a random terrain. ?
Card.Info: Lex moves to a random terrain.
Card.Mechanics: Return to previous terrain (TO BE EDITED)

Card.Name: Bat Colony
Card.Description: Lex accidentally disturbs a colony of bats and is swarmed by the angry creatures. He loses 5 points.
Card.Info: -5 Points
Card.Mechanics: -5 Points

Card.Name: Cynocephali Merchants
Card.Description: Lex meets some kind but awfully chatty dog-headed people. They insist on asking him of his travels...
Card.Info: A random, potentially beneficial effect happens.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, 50% Chance +3 magic OR -3 points

Card.Name: Heavy Rain
Card.Description: It is too dangerous to travel during a sudden rainstorm.
Card.Info: Lex cannot change terrain next day phase, loses 3 points and discards a card.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain, -3 Points, Discard a card

Card.Name: Mushroom Poisoning
Card.Description: All of Lex’s food has mysteriously gone bad and must be discarded, and he doesn’t have enough to sleep here.
Card.Info: A random, negative effect happens.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, 50% Discards two cards OR -4 Points

Card.Name: Swamp Hole
Card.Description: Lex’s leg gets caught in a pit of mud. He can't move, and he gets hungrier the longer he stays there.
Card.Info: Cannot move terrain until end of day. -2 points per day phase until swamp is left.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain until end of day, -2 points per day phase until swamp is left

Card.Name: The Stomach Rumbles
Card.Description: There’s no greater calamity than the one Lex wrought upon that ditch. Lex cannot move terrain during the next day phase, but get 2 points for relieving himself.
Card.Info: Cannot move terrain until end of day. +2 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain, +2 Points

Card.Name: Well Kept House Owners Return
Card.Description: Lex manages to snag a few things on his way out, despite being followed closely by an aggressive broom.
Card.Info: +2 Magic for each card in hand. -5 points and additional -5 for each time Well-Kept House was played
Card.Mechanics: -5 Points, additional -5 for each time Well Kept House was played. +2 Magic for each card in hand

Card.Name: Ravenous Pack of Hounds
Card.Description: Who knows when these poor dogs were last fed! They steal some of Lex's food! -2 Points and discard two cards.
Card.Info: -2 Points and discard two cards.
Card.Mechanics: -2 Points and discard two cards.

Card.Name: Crossroads
Card.Description: The crossroads of Dendimir are known for their danger. A card has been added to the Wilderness' and Lex's decks.
Card.Info: Random card added to AI and Lex decks.
Card.Mechanics: Random week 3 card added to Lex and AI decks
